author: sky.cactus
content: I see a lot of people posting about L1 "solutions to MEV extraction" but I don't read them all.  Has anyone seen a suggestion of just adding a simple feature to the EVM that would allow contracts to solve MEV themselves?

author: sky.cactus
content: The one I have in my head at the moment is to just make it so a contract can "queue" an end-of-block transaction, gas paid by the contract itself, with limits put on external calls it can make, full gas limit is sent, and each contract gets exactly one of these.  This would allow contracts like DEXes to do block auctions by accumulating trades throughout the block and then executing them all at the end.

author: sky.cactus
content: Could also be scheduled for start of next block instead, which would allow for gas limits instead of burning everything.
